name: Beginner's Method
description: Layer-by-layer solving method ideal for learning. Solves the cube in 7 intuitive steps using a small set of easy-to-remember algorithms.

stages.name: White Cross
stages.description: Create a white cross on the bottom layer with matching edge colors

stages.name: White Corners
stages.description: Position and orient all white corners to complete the first layer

stages.name: Middle Layer Edges
stages.description: Insert the four middle layer edges into their correct positions

stages.name: Yellow Cross
stages.description: Create a yellow cross on the top layer

stages.name: Yellow Corner Position
stages.description: Move yellow corners to their correct positions

stages.name: Yellow Corner Orientation
stages.description: Orient the yellow corners to solve the cube
